title: Enhancing Nursing Practice Competencies: Strategies for Senior Computer Utilization and Quality of Life Improvement

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: The correlation between computer usage data and quality of life indicators among the elderly can be analyzed mathematically
Path Analysis techniques can be employed to model causal relationships between computer proficiency, self-efficacy, and quality of life
Multilevel statistical models reflecting gender and technology level differences can be designed and interpreted
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
